column2: Fiat Chrysler CEO approached GM about a merger
column3: was rebuffed -NYT May 23 As part of his quest for a mega merger
column4: Fiat Chrysler Automobiles  Chief Executive Sergio Marchionne sent an email to General Motors Co Chief Executive Officer Mary Barra in March suggesting combining the automakers but was rebuffed
column5: the New York Times reported on Saturday.

column2: Amazon changes tax practices in Europe as investigations continue - WSJ NEW YORK
column3: May 24 Amazon.com Inc has started booking revenue from retail sales in individual European countries
column4: instead of channeling all sales through low-tax Luxembourg
column5: the Wall Street Journal reported Sunday.
